Description: Can a P1 or P2 provisional driver legally instruct a learner driver?

Options.Description: Yes; provided the provisional driver has held a P2 licence for more than 6 months
Yes; provided L and P1 or P2 plates are displayed.

Description: To progress to a P2 provisional licence a P1 provisional driver must hold a P1 licence for a minimum period of
If one or two of your wheels run off the edge of the roadway you should

Options.Description: Slow down gradually and ease back onto the road
Slow down quickly by braking hard
Increase your speed and drive back on the road

Description: If there are no lanes marked on the road you should drive

Options.Description: Near to the left-hand side of the road
Anywhere on your side of the road
Along the middle of the road

Description: How close can you park to another vehicle when parked parallel to the kerb?

Options.Description: You must leave at least 1 metre front and back.
You must leave at least 2 metres from the front only.
You must leave at least 3 metres front and back.
